column4: open alsamixer in the terminal, and look in the upper left for a listed driver
under card it says VIA8235, under chip it says Realtek ALC650E
ok, have all the ctrls turned right up and no "M"s in the boxes , especially Master and Line
OMG I'm so sory for wasting everyone's time, That was it there were MM's in all the boxes, I'm such a TOOL thankyou so much
